snippet: Daniel Dominguez, who took more than $300,000 from the Corona Community Volunteer Ambulance Corps, must also pay full restitution.
abstract: Queens Judge Joel Blumenfeld sentences emergency medical technician Daniel Dominguez to four months in jail and orders him to pay full restitution after Dominguez pleaded guilty to embezzling over $300,000 from Corona Community Volunteer Ambulance Corps.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Dominguez, who took more than $300,000 from the Corona Community Volunteer Ambulance Corps, must also pay full restitution.

headline.main: Queens E.M.T. Who Stole From Ambulance Service Gets 4 Months in Jail
headline.print_headline: Jail Time for E.M.T. Who Stole $300,000
